statements: SELECT * FROM vehicle_emissions_tests;
SELECT test_date, test_result FROM vehicle_emissions_tests WHERE compliance_status = TRUE;
SELECT vehicle_id, test_date, test_result FROM vehicle_emissions_tests WHERE test_result = 'Pass';
SELECT * FROM vehicle_emissions_tests WHERE test_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT vehicle_id, compliance_status FROM vehicle_emissions_tests WHERE compliance_status = FALSE;
SELECT * FROM vehicle_emissions_tests WHERE compliance_status = TRUE ORDER BY test_date DESC;
SELECT vehicle_id, test_result FROM vehicle_emissions_tests WHERE test_result LIKE '%Pass%' AND compliance_status = FALSE;
SELECT DISTINCT test_date FROM vehicle_emissions_tests WHERE compliance_status = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM vehicle_emissions_tests WHERE compliance_status = FALSE ORDER BY test_date, vehicle_id;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_tests, AVG(vehicle_id) AS avg_vehicle_id FROM vehicle_emissions_tests;
SELECT * FROM Vehicle;
SELECT make, model FROM Vehicle WHERE year = 2020;
SELECT make, model, year FROM Vehicle WHERE emissions_rating = 'A';
SELECT * FROM EmissionsTest ORDER BY test_date DESC;
SELECT make, model FROM Vehicle WHERE year BETWEEN 2018 AND 2020;
SELECT * FROM Vehicle WHERE year > 2015 ORDER BY make ASC;
SELECT make, model, emissions_rating FROM Vehicle WHERE year = 2020;
SELECT test_id, test_date, test_result FROM EmissionsTest WHERE test_result = 'Pass' ORDER BY test_date DESC;
SELECT make, model, year, emissions_rating FROM Vehicle WHERE make LIKE '%Toyota%' AND emissions_rating = 'Low';
SELECT v.make, v.model, t.test_date, t.test_result FROM Vehicle v INNER JOIN EmissionsTest t ON v.vehicle_id = t.vehicle_id;
SELECT make, model, year FROM vehicle ORDER BY year DESC
SELECT make, model FROM vehicle WHERE make='Toyota'
SELECT * FROM emissions_test ORDER BY test_date ASC
SELECT vehicle_id, compliance_status FROM compliance_data WHERE compliance_status='Approved'
SELECT make, model, year, fuel_type FROM vehicle
SELECT * FROM vehicle WHERE year > 2015 ORDER BY make ASC, model DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT v.make, v.model, e.test_date FROM vehicle v JOIN emissions_test e ON v.vehicle_id = e.vehicle_id WHERE e.test_result = 'Pass'
SELECT v.year, COUNT(e.test_id) AS num_tests FROM vehicle v LEFT JOIN emissions_test e ON v.vehicle_id = e.vehicle_id GROUP BY v.year HAVING num_tests > 5 ORDER BY v.year
SELECT v.make, v.model, cd.compliance_status FROM vehicle v JOIN compliance_data cd ON v.vehicle_id = cd.vehicle_id WHERE cd.compliance_status = 'Non-Compliant'

SELECT v.make, v.model, e.test_result, cd.compliance_status FROM vehicle v JOIN emissions_test e ON v.vehicle_id = e.vehicle_id LEFT JOIN compliance_data cd ON v.vehicle_id = cd.vehicle_id WHERE e.test_result = 'Fail' AND cd.compliance_status = 'Non-Compliant'
SELECT * FROM Vehicle;
SELECT manufacturer, model, year FROM Vehicle WHERE year > 2010;
SELECT * FROM EmissionTest ORDER BY test_date DESC;
SELECT manufacturer, model, emission_rating FROM Vehicle WHERE manufacturer = 'Toyota';
SELECT compliance_id, compliance_date, compliance_status FROM Compliance WHERE compliance_status = 'Passed';
SELECT * FROM Vehicle LIMIT 5;
SELECT manufacturer, model, year FROM Vehicle WHERE year > 2010 ORDER BY manufacturer DESC;
SELECT v.*, e.test_date FROM Vehicle v JOIN EmissionTest e ON v.vehicle_id = e.vehicle_id WHERE e.test_result = 'Pass' ORDER BY v.year ASC, e.test_date DESC;
SELECT c.compliance_id, v.manufacturer, v.model, c.compliance_status FROM Compliance c JOIN Vehicle v ON c.vehicle_id = v.vehicle_id WHERE c.compliance_date BETWEEN '2020-01-01' AND '2021-01-01';

SELECT tc.center_name, COUNT(e.test_id) AS total_tests FROM TestCenter tc LEFT JOIN EmissionTest e ON tc.center_id = e.vehicle_id GROUP BY tc.center_name HAVING total_tests > 0 ORDER BY total_tests DESC;
SELECT * FROM Vehicle_Details;
SELECT vehicle_make, vehicle_model, year_of_manufacture FROM Vehicle_Details WHERE year_of_manufacture > 2015;
SELECT registration_date, emission_test_result FROM Vehicle_Details WHERE emission_test_result = 'Pass';
SELECT * FROM Emission_Standards WHERE co_limit < 5.0 AND nox_limit < 2.0;
SELECT center_name, location FROM Test_Centers ORDER BY center_name DESC;
SELECT vehicle_make, vehicle_model, year_of_manufacture FROM Vehicle_Details WHERE registration_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Emission_Standards WHERE co_limit < 3 AND nox_limit < 2;
SELECT record_id, test_date, test_result, co_level FROM Emission_Test_Records WHERE nox_level > 1 ORDER BY test_date DESC;
SELECT center_name, location, director_name FROM Test_Centers WHERE center_id BETWEEN 1 AND 5;

SELECT v.vehicle_make, v.vehicle_model, t.test_date, t.test_result, c.compliance_date, c.compliance_status FROM Vehicle_Details v JOIN Emission_Test_Records t ON v.id = t.vehicle_id JOIN Compliance_Status c ON t.record_id = c.record_id WHERE c.compliance_status = 'Passed';
